column4: for some reason, when i login locally to my server, i can ssh into from remote just fine; as soon as i log out locally though, i can't ....
that is when you log in locally too?
did you try with just a username and password instead of keys?
sounds like a problem with the key almost.
it works fine with just using the password...
you have to revisit your key setup, I think.
did you follow a tutorial, or how did you set that up?
i did, sort of.. but it works when i'm logged in locally. could it be a permission issue?
dunno, what are the steps you took?
installed openssh-server, configured it to work only with keys....
when i setup up the server, i set it to automatically encrypt my home dir, could that be why? it can't compare the keys because they;re encrypted?
when i setup up the server, i set it to automatically encrypt my home dir, could that be why? it can't compare the keys because they;re encrypted?
so how would i fix that?
ty for the insight, ill surf a little
